content.body:
I invited Jake here because he has done a lot of work converting TypeScript to use ESM. There are still some challenges before TS can go "fully ESM". 

Potentially Joyee/Guy/Nicolo may have some thoughts on this.
content.formatted_body:

content.body: Greetings jakebailey, very interested in your perspective / grievances.

content.body: Hi jakebailey Rob's mentioned some of your use cases, would be great to discuss further either here or in our weekly meetings if you'd like to join
